RepresentativeComplaints.Description: MY 2000 DODGE DURANGO 4.7  UPPER BALL JOINT FAILED AND HAS UNUSAL RUSTED WEAR AND TEAR FOR  THIS VEHICLE.  AFTER AN INSPECTION I WAS ALERTED THAT THIS BALL JOINT WAS UNUALLY WORN AND THAT IT WOULD NEED REPLACING.   THERE WAS NO INDICATION THAT IT HAD WORN

MY 2000 DODGE DURANGO 4.7  UPPER BALL JOINT FAILED AND HAS UNUSAL RUSTED WEAR AND TEAR FOR  THIS VEHICLE.  AFTER AN INSPECTION I WAS ALERTED THAT THIS BALL JOINT WAS UNUALLY WORN AND THAT IT WOULD NEED REPLACING.   THERE WAS NO INDICATION THAT IT HAD WORN

THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER TO GET NEW TIRES.  THE DEALER COULD NOT ALIGN THE FRONT END DUE TO METAL FATIGUE OF THE UPPER BALL JOINTS.  THE UPPER BALL JOINTS WERE REPLACED.  PLEASE PROVIDE THE VIN# ALONG WITH ANY ADDITIONAL INFORMATION.  *NM

CONSUMER TOOK VEHICLE TO THE DEALER  FOR REPLACEMENT OF  TIRES, AND MECHANIC NOTICED THAT ALL FOUR TIRES WERE  DEFECTIVE  AND WORN OUT DUE TO WHEEL ALIGNMENT.  ALSO,  BOTH UPPER AND LOWER BALL JOINTS NEEDED TO BE REPLACED DUE TO CORROSION.  *AK

CONSUMER TOOK VEHICLE TO THE DEALER  FOR REPLACEMENT OF  TIRES, AND MECHANIC NOTICED THAT ALL FOUR TIRES WERE  DEFECTIVE  AND WORN OUT DUE TO WHEEL ALIGNMENT.  ALSO,  BOTH UPPER AND LOWER BALL JOINTS NEEDED TO BE REPLACED DUE TO CORROSION.  *AK

THE FRONT BALL JOINTS ARE LOOSE CAUSING THE TIRES TO WEAR OUT UNREASONALBE SOONER.  THE FRONT UPPER BALL JOINTS NEED TO BE REPLACED AND CAN BECOME DANGEROUS.  THE FRONT END MAKES NOISES AND FEELS UNSECURED AT TIMES.*AK  I HAVE ASKED THE DEALER TO EXAM THE

DURING  A VEHICLE INSPECTION, THE INSPECTOR FOUND THAT THE UPPER AND LOWER BALL JOINTS WERE WORN OUT.  THE UPPER AND LOWER BALL JOINTS WERE REPLACED.   *AK   *SC  *JB
